4.80.text: To photocopy from a book using the York print plus multifunctional devices,

10.08.text: sign in by swiping your University card,

10.43.text: or by entering your username and password on the screen.

15.10.text:
Align the book spine with
the book symbol on the device

21.12.text: Select copy, book mode, and select on.

27.76.text: Then select pages per sheet, and select two.

32.28.text: Finally, select sides, press one to two sided output, press copy and select

38.28.text: whether you wish to copy a full spread of the book or a single page.

42.20.text: Colour preferences and other custom options are also available.

47.02.text: The amount of work you can copy is limited, to protect the rights of authors and publishers.
